extendedInfo.description: A simple, fast and easy to use unit converter now with Currency conversions!A simple and friendly unit converter with a clean user interface. It includes Quick List View to access different unit.Tired of faulty converter of market with lots of ads,myAll in one unit converter allows easy and quick conversion between units.It provides a fast, reliable and comfortable tool to convert values into different categories such as Current,Density,Torque,Mass, Length, Temperature,Volume,Tip,Speed and Currency Converter available.Currently the currency converter supports Indian,us dollar,european euro,canadian dollar,australian and singapore dollarit also has formula for each unit conversion,reset button,exit button,apps2sd for 2.2+ and nice ui.if you want to help to convert the app to your language please mail me.for your help i will put your name in credit section.being an indie indian developer ,i cannot publish paid app on google play,so people interested in purchasing the ads free paid version can purchase from SlideMe market.i will add the link to download paid in next version.features in next updates:-*physics conversion*time*data size.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!regarding the permission :-all for above ads.
